## Origins

This tutorial is an interpretation of the neon data skills tutorial at:
http://neondataskills.org/R/Raster-Data-In-R/

## Load Libraries

The basic libraries needed for working with rasters in R are `raster`, `sp`, and `rgdal`.

```{r load_libraries}
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
```
